com.rwhitear.ucsdHttpRequest

Class UCSDHttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rwhitear.ucsdHttpRequest.UCSDHttpRequest

  • public class UCSDHttpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main entry point for this library. Use the methods here for HTTP(S) connection setup and control.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Russ Whitear (rwhitear@cisco.com)

                       java.lang.String protocol,
                       java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - IP address of target system.
        protocol - Transport protocol of target system ("http" or "https").
        username - Username for HTTP basic authentication.
        password - Password for HTTP basic authentication.

      • UCSDHttpRequest

        public UCSDHttpRequest(java.lang.String ipAddress,
                       java.lang.String protocol,
                       int port)
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - IP address of target system.
        protocol - Transport protocol of target system ("http" or "https").
        port - TCP port for target system (Not necessarily 80 or 443).

      • UCSDHttpRequest

        public UCSDHttpRequest(java.lang.String ipAddress,
                       java.lang.String protocol,
                       int port,
                       java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - IP address of target system.
        protocol - Transport protocol of target system ("http" or "https").
        port - TCP port for target system (Not necessarily 80 or 443).
        username - Username for HTTP basic authentication.
        password - Password for HTTP basic authentication.
